 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְגִנָּה‎</span> **noun feminine** ==covering==, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְגִנַּתלֵֿב‎</span> [[Lam.3.65|Lam 3:65]] ***covering of heart***, i.e. a hard shell about the heart = ***obstinacy***, so [[BDB#Ges|Ges]] (compare Qor 6:25 <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) [[BDB#RV|RV]]; or, ***covering of the understanding, blindness of the heart***, so [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#Ke|Ke]] [[BDB#Näg|Näg]] [[BDB#Che|Che]].
